overview: Gloria Simbiak, a swimming athlete, has to fight her way out of the labyrinth of depression due to loss of leg function which for a swimmer is like losing a life. The days were filled with sorrow and deep wounds. Gloria felt that the victory she had previously achieved and was within her grasp, becoming a gold medalist athlete in the swimming Olympics, had become useless. Gloria tries to get through the days that will never be the same, to move on or stop and regret it with grandmother Isy and her three best friends, Julvri, Idho and Eliza.
title: Glo, Kau Cahaya
